price: Deε wͻka ne sε: “Yεwͻ sika ne mma pii, na yεn deε yεntwe yɛn aso.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālū naḥnu aktharu amwālan wa-awlādan wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
